allowed_claims: energy star certified (energy-efficiency, not carbon number)
made with recycled materials (only if % or scope stated)
disallowed_claims: estimated co2/co2e values inferred from price/weight/shipping
net zero/carbon neutral as verified fact without cited standard + boundary
claims that translate energy saved into co2 without a verified dataset
required_conditions_for_numeric: numeric carbon values must be explicitly present on the page OR from a verified dataset controlled by EcoAware
must include a clear boundary/scope indicator (cradle-to-gate vs cradle-to-grave)
must reference a method/standard (iso 14067, ghg protocol, or described lca methodology)
if relying on offsets, must have verifiable details (registry/retirement); otherwise treat as unverified

phrasing_templates.no_data: No verified carbon-footprint data available. EcoAware does not estimate CO2.
phrasing_templates.qualitative_only: Qualitative sustainability language found, but no verifiable carbon number with clear boundary/method.
phrasing_templates.numeric_with_source: A carbon figure is shown on the page. EcoAware reports it as a quoted value and flags whether scope/method/verification cues are present.

notes_for_judges: EcoAware never estimates CO2. Numeric claims are only displayed if present on-page or from a verified registry. Even when present, EcoAware requires scope/boundary/method cues to treat them as credible.
